37.comment: A simple box morph. A really blue one. Its amazing what you can build out of simple boxes.... Who needs stars when you got blue rectangles!

80.comment:
A splitter, that exchanges the extent from two morphs.... ok, hard to describe. It's just a splitter.

Inspired by the resize corner, it latebinds into the ui, by placing it ontop two adjacent morphs.
